channel.title: jnngle on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in jnngle on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Jumgle - a poem
item.description: 2019 July @ Bangalore A land of leaves And magnificent beasts Live with grace In a Happy place The JUNGLE is the best place. Where tigers growl Squirrel squeak You’ll hear heavenly tunes. Waterfalls roaring Trees are clapping Gentle buzzing in the stream the forest my home I will never leave it.
